about_the_game:
MageCosmos is a creative VR community for those who look for diverse experience in a single game. Join us to discover more and more !


Own An Island Here!
MageCosmos is an open world where your adventures are unlimited. Your wonderful journey starts on a magical floating island with your own cozy house on it, like everybody else. Looking around, you will find neighbors living on the same island as you do. This is a HUGE world !


Farming In The Sky
Your life on the island depends pretty much on how you manage it. You have a big farm to grow various plants, some animals to feed, everything on your island is your personal asset, investing time and watching your island flourish is pretty exciting. Oh by the way, don't forget to set up a shield before you leave or your farm can be "robbed" by friends and even strangers.


Friends With Neighbors
Speaking of that, friends are important or it'll be so lonely in such an infinite world, shake hands with whoever you meet to become friends with and send gifts to them. You can also use a small rocket, fly around and explore the neighborhood on your own sometimes.


Games And Worlds
As is implied in the name "Cosmos", we are creating diverse styles of worlds to travel across, and party games for you and friends to play together...It's gonna be fun!


So what are you waiting for? Join the magical world of MageCosmos now and experience the ultimate social VR adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit, Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Valve Index, Pico 3/4, Oculus Quest 1/2/Pro (using Oculus Link), Windows Mixed Reality headsets
